title: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - Camino de la Warner
title_short: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - Camino de la Warner
description: Very quiet place to spend the night. Right next to the amusement park (Movie World).

title: (28026) Madrid - 83 Avenida de Rafaela Ybarra
description: It is a parking lot between the pradolongo park and a sports center (with a paid swimming pool in summer and more services), a minute's walk from an entrance to the park there is a public bath, next to a residence. Also, not far away there is a gas station also with restrooms and a store, I don't know if they have more services but it's a question of asking? Nearby you have public transport to get to the city center if you are visiting (bus 60, 6, 78, 81 and metro Plaza Elíptica lines 6 and 11)

title: (28350) Ciempozuelos - 24 Paseo de la Estación
description: Field on the outskirts of Ciempozuelo.

title: (28350) Ciempozuelos - 11 Camino de la Cuesta Alta
title_short: (28350) Ciempozuelos - 11 Camino de la Cuesta Alta
description: Very quiet place, little traffic to sleep. You have free access to the toilets that the sports center has.

title: (28041) Madrid - 9B Calle Joaquín Soler
description: Parking next to the metro and the caja mágica

title: (28660) - 211A Terreno Sector Sur 11
description: Wide free open parking place attached to the ML-3 tram station terminal. It has 3 levels. I recommend the last/upper one. Almost nobody uses it. The police use to patrol the area so it’s safe. There are a couple of grocery shops at the other side of the street. The tram takes you to Madrid in 30min. No services in the parking lot. Lots of restaurants and shops in the same avenue downwards. Walking trails at a block distance. Nice sunsets from the upper part of the parking lot.

title: (28019) Madrid -
description: Automatic washing machines - buy the tokens at the service station)

title: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - Calle Aragón
title_short: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - Calle Aragón
description: Private parking of Warner Park, Overnight stay is not allowed, no shade except if you go early and you get under the bridge.

title: (28011) Madrid -
description: Site. Very calm. Park and spend the night. Metro station adapted with elevator. Pretty good for wheelchairs

title: (28047) Madrid - Av. de Angel Sanz Briz
title_short: (28047) Madrid - Av. de Angel Sanz Briz
description: Free parking next to the metro, from there 20 minutes by metro into the city.

title: (28019) Madrid - 54 Calle Comandante Fontanes
description: Quite and free parking, no heigh limit, ground is sand and pretty flat. Next to a big park where its nice to have breakfast. Also very close to the metro. Neighborhood is really nice and friendly.

title: (28041) Madrid - 90 Camino de Perales
description: Hundreds of public parking spaces next to the apple tree park. at night in September it was mostly empty. trees for shade, quiet area. drinking water point within the park. AC is not expressly prohibited but neighbors are not disturbed, I do not think they come to disturb vans / AC.

title: (28011) Madrid - Unnamed Road
description: Parking limited to the hours of the zoo. Looking a little, you will find places where the ac is perfectly parked. perfect for visiting the zoo.

title: (28041) Madrid - 34 Calle de González Feito
description: Good place to stay 4 the night. Just the closest spot to M30 inner circle and proper place if going to a festival in the Enrique Tierno Galván Park (i.e. tomavistas). just an urban place to park during the day and stay at night, for free in Madrid (which is not easy).

title: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 12 Calle Andalucía
title_short: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 12 Calle Andalucía
description: Supermarkets 8 minutes walk. Quiet at night. You don't spend the night alone, there were 6 or 7 more motorhomes

title: (28047) Madrid -
description: Free parking. Outside the regulated parking area. Next to the Green Wedge Park. Bus to the center 24h. 10 'walking from Madrid Río, 45' walking from Plaza Mayor and Casa de Campo (walking all through the park). Bike path to Madrid Río and Casa de Campo. Ideal to visit Madrid.

title: (28609) Sevilla la Nueva - Camino de Perales
title_short: (28609) Sevilla la Nueva - Camino de Perales
description: Dehesa in Seville the new, quiet place, you have to take a path to get to the picnic, there is a water source that works in verano.Sitio with much charm in the town.

title: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 40 Calle Extremadura
title_short: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 40 Calle Extremadura
description: Solar where there are several motorhomes of neighbors in the area. I have spent a quiet night. I don't think there should be a problem staying.  Close to go to Parque Warner.

title: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 2 Avenida Comunidad de Madrid
title_short: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 2 Avenida Comunidad de Madrid
description: One night here with other motorhome before Parque Warner. Little noise till late of people entering cars.

title: (28011) Madrid - P.º de la Venta
description: Free off-road parking inside a park. 500 m from the metro. We arrived at 8pm and the parking space was almost free. No service.

title: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 1 Calle Navarra
title_short: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 1 Calle Navarra
description: We use it in our visit to the Warner. Right next to a Mercadon

title: (28011) Madrid - C. Maria del Carmen
description: Street parking area where we have left our car, and we have had no problems sleeping. The only drawback is that it is a bus stop area, because there is a stop right in front of it, but we even left our bikes in the bike rack for a full day and night, while we walked around Madrid, and they were not stolen. I want to think that it was not by chance, but because this falls within what should be normal

title: (28047) Madrid - 2 Calle de Pablo Sarasate
description: We have slept on this street without problems, and without noise one night. There are no motorhome prohibition signs, and we are a 40-minute walk from the center of Madrid.

title: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 16 Calle de Concha Espina
title_short: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 16 Calle de Concha Espina
description: Very quiet street to spend the night, right at the point, at the end of it. It can be occupied by neighbors cars. No blue zone.

title: (28011) Madrid - Carr. del Parque de Atracciones
title_short: (28011) Madrid - Carr. del Parque de Atracciones
description: Parking right next to the amusement park, outside the area where daytime parking is only allowed. There are more users who spend the night to go to the park, which gives security. The area is flat and wide with trees.

title: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 55 Calle de Isaac Peral
title_short: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 55 Calle de Isaac Peral

title_short: (28609) Sevilla la Nueva - Vereda de la Resancha

title: (28011) Madrid - 3 Carretera del Parque de Atracciones
title_short: (28011) Madrid - 3 Carretera del Parque de Atracciones
description: Park a little bit relish when the amusement park is open. It is located in the park Casa de Campo, a forest, although near the city center. There are many trees that form beautiful shadows and picnic tables. Workers in the park of attractions have no problems with campers. A fountain is located 5 minutes from the other side of the road (behind the attraction park), left of the small stream.

title: (45291) Cobeja - Cam. Molinos
description: Parking next to a football stadium, very quiet.

title: (28053) Madrid - 103 Calle Reguera de Tomateros

Large paved but very simple parking lot without limited signage in the immediate vicinity of various sports facilities. 300 m from El Pozo train station and from there suburban trains to Madrid Atocha train station.
Shade morning or afternoon depending on location.

title: (28011) Madrid - 2 Ronda Toros
description: Large parking lot as a stopgap when "Casa do Campo" is crowded. 40 mins walk from Madrid.

title: (28011) Madrid - 108 Paseo de Extremadura
description: Laundromat, with laundry and softener included. Machines with coins.

title: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 1C Avenida Comunidad de Madrid

description: Parking of the fairground of the Casa de Campo. It is frequented by motorhomes and vans, it is a quiet place to spend the night and close to the metro. The downtown is 15 minutes walking.

title: (28011) Madrid - 4 Ronda Lago

title: (28011) Madrid - 7 Calle Ferial

title: (28011) Madrid - 3 Carretera Teleférico
description: Valuable place to visit Madrid. attached to the cycle path and in the middle of the park. Cable car that takes you downtown and restaurants and activities within walking distance. water fountain and dirt bins. at night the parking lot is completely illuminated and empty. recommended

title: (28053) Madrid -
description: Parking in the train of the well little traveled, admits any vehicle is quiet if you would sleep here

title: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 4D Plaza de la Constitución
title_short: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 4D Plaza de la Constitución
description: Parking with few spaces but ample, next to the town hall and the local police (safe area). Next door is the Victoria bar, with delicious homemade cakes and sweets!

title: (28045) Madrid - 5 Calle Estrella Denébola
description: Public parking with blue zone, 4h 8.20e, at night without payment.

title: (28045) Madrid - 13 Calle Villarrobledo

title: (28031) Madrid - 81 Calle de Luis I
description: Gas station low cost, with pressure washing where they are suitable for motorhomes, we have seen no faucet. Everything is self-service, there is a vending machine for snacks but there is no WC. Good price of fuel.

title: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 24 Avenida Abogados de Atocha
title_short: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 24 Avenida Abogados de Atocha
description: Soccer field parking. It has a main road next to it. The cars are heard all day. But it is a quiet area. You can sleep peacefully.

title: (28011) Madrid - 14 Paseo Puerta del Ángel

title: (28011) Madrid - Paseo de la Puerta del Ángel
title_short: (28011) Madrid - Paseo de la Puerta del Ángel

title: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 24 Avenida Abogados de Atocha
title_short: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 24 Avenida Abogados de Atocha
description: Great esplanade where you can park and spend the night. Without services Quiet. Next to the municipal soccer field.

title: (28012) Madrid - 2 Calle de Miguel Servet
description: Bathhouse which offers showers for a fee. 20 minutes of hot water and the shower space is big and clean, as it is cleaned after every use.  Currently open from 8:30-18:30 everyday, except Sunday only until 14:30.

title: (28011) Madrid - 6 Paseo del Embarcadero
description: Public parking without the possibility to stay overnight.

title: (28018) Madrid - 2 Calle Historias de la Radio
title_short: (28018) Madrid - 2 Calle Historias de la Radio
description: Laundry with 5 washers and 3 dryers. You do not need detergent.

title: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 114 Calle de Alfonso X el Sabio
title_short: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 114 Calle de Alfonso X el Sabio
description:
Parking lot of Parque Tierno Galvan, near the Wagner, you can sleep here. 
Fountains with drinking water and toilets in the Parque, which closes at 18.30 in winter. Supernice Parque for kids, with playing gardens, and nice stroll around the lake.

address.street: 114 Calle de Alfonso X el Sabio

title: (28005) Madrid - 26 Paseo Ciudad de Plasencia
description: Area in orange and blue lines. No height and length limit between two parks. Cars can park up to 12 hours and the maximum rate is six euros.

title: (28690) Brunete - 31 Calle Madrid
description: Quiet street near local police, several parks next door with benches and shade. Supermarket Day next door too. Online parking

title: (45950) Casarrubios del Monte - Autovía del Suroeste, 47
title_short: (45950) Casarrubios del Monte - Autovía del Suroeste, 47
description: Rest area on the A5 highway, between Valmojado and Santa Cruz del Retamar. It has a large parking lot to spend the night and the restaurant is 24 hours a day. Shower service available.

title: (28053) Madrid - 3 Calle del Monte Perdido
description: There are more like two parking lots during the day and at night it is good to leave the vehicle safe because it is quite colorful but not for sleeping, there are garbage cans the Ibis next door, Burger King, KFC, it is next to the Puente de Vallecas metro to sun in 4 or 5 stops. If you have a gym basic fit there is one and you can shower

title: (28224) Madrid - Unnamed Road
description:
Public parking.
3 portable toilets and bins.
Quiet site and frequented peak, very quiet.

title: (28011) Madrid - Pl. de las Moreras
description: In Casa de Campo in Madrid, before one of the exits of the M30. It is a wide roundabout with spaces for about 30 vehicles. Very quiet and there is a fountain

title: (28012) Madrid - 54 Calle de Atocha
description: Pretty good looking laundy. Finding a parking place is almost impossible but a bit further it is managable. As of no nut sure about the opening hours since a sheet of paper blocked the times (8-22:00)

title: (28008) Madrid - 38 Cuesta de San Vicente
description: A car park with a perfect location in Madrid. Important to know, if you reserve online 2 hours earlier, it costs less.

title: (28690) Brunete - 1A Calle Norte
description: Parking under trees. Located next to the Jose Ramon de la Morena sports center. It has shade. It has a source. And it is a quiet area.

title: (28051) Madrid - 24 Calle Villamanta
description: Highly recommended climbing wall, with plenty of space to park the motorhome.

title: (28008) Madrid - 14 Cuesta de San Vicente
description: Parking in the center of Madrid with height for vans

title: (28008) Madrid - 1 Calle Profesor Martín Almagro Basch
title_short: (28008) Madrid - 1 Calle Profesor Martín Almagro Basch
description: Public parking at 2 steps from Plaza de España. Paid and frequented the day. Calm and less used at night.

title: (28031) Madrid - Calle la Granja de San Ildefonso
title_short: (28031) Madrid - Calle la Granja de San Ildefonso
description: Parking area, surrounded by trees and with a water fountain, picnic tables and surrounded by green areas. In addition, it is close to the spectacular Parque de La Gavia and 200 meters away there is a restaurant with portions such as Rincón de Minaya where we ate delicious and cheap dinners. We spent a very quiet night because that road is not busy at night.

address.street: Calle la Granja de San Ildefonso

title: (28008) Madrid - 2 Calle de Francisco y Jacinto Alcántara
title_short: (28008) Madrid - 2 Calle de Francisco y Jacinto Alcántara
description: Car parking on which it is possible to park motorhomes (even 7.5m like ours). you still have to be lucky to find a place. parking free from Saturday 3 p.m. parking near the heart of Madrid. 10min from Plaza de España or the Royal Palace. Municipal police building just under the parking lot, reassuring.

address.street: 2 Calle de Francisco y Jacinto Alcántara

title: (28609) Villanueva de Perales - 126 Poligono 12
description:
This is a very quiet town, it has three fountains in the center of the town, bakery, supermarket, butcher, pharmacy...
I recommend it, I have spent a few nights and you can sleep peacefully, it is 35 minutes from Madrid and 20 minutes from the Picadas dam, which is a spectacular natural site.

title: (28008) Madrid - Paseo de Camoens
description: Pay zone, for vans and motorhomes, although it's a bit small for motorhomes. Zone painted orange / blue, holidays closed to traffic. It is next to the Madrid cable car.
